item.title: Line + 1?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

private boolean read(String path) { File pathFile = new File(path); if(pathFile.exists()) { BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(pathFile)); int linesRead = 6; int toAdd = 1; // What is to be added. int lineNumber = 1; // This is the line number, what line it is up to. String line; while((line = in.readLine()) != null) { linesRead += toAdd; toAdd++; lineNumber++; } return true; } else { return false; } }

item.title: Line + 1?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

how would i make it so for every line it adds one to an number

so lets say its on line one and the deafualt number is 6
so the firs tline would add 1 to 6
6 + 1

the second would add 2
6 + 2

and so on and so fourth
but the trick is is that im trying to read it from a text file so it has to know which line its on
im thinking of looping but im not sure

heres what i have but im clue less it has errors to cus it doesnt work
but thats the ide as in below

[code] public boolean readLine(String path) {
int l = 6;
String line = null;
try {
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(path));

		while((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
				l = line + 1;
				return true;
		}

	 } catch(Exception e) {
		return false;
	}
	return false;
}

[/code]
